query:
SELECT ig.id, ig.name, ig.slug, 
  IF(ig.overview IS NOT NULL AND ig.overview != '', 'YES', 'NO') as has_overview,
  IF(ig.topThingsToDo IS NOT NULL AND ig.topThingsToDo != '', 'YES', 'NO') as has_activities
FROM island_guides ig
WHERE ig.name IN ('Himmafushi', 'Omadhoo', 'Feridhoo', 'Dhangethi', 'Mathiveri', 'Gulhi', 'Goidhoo', 'Fulhadhoo', 'Fehendhoo', 'Hanimadhoo', 'Fuvahmulah')
ORDER BY ig.name
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FFv3TtDUeNbYDM.root --database JUCCYykxYWxAcNny3wop55 --execute SELECT ig.id, ig.name, ig.slug, 
  IF(ig.overview IS NOT NULL AND ig.overview != '', 'YES', 'NO') as has_overview,
  IF(ig.topThingsToDo IS NOT NULL AND ig.topThingsToDo != '', 'YES', 'NO') as has_activities
FROM island_guides ig
WHERE ig.name IN ('Himmafushi', 'Omadhoo', 'Feridhoo', 'Dhangethi', 'Mathiveri', 'Gulhi', 'Goidhoo', 'Fulhadhoo', 'Fehendhoo', 'Hanimadhoo', 'Fuvahmulah')
ORDER BY ig.name
